title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.301 - Chili con carne with beans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.301 - Chili con carne with beans

State Regulations

Chili con carne with beans shall contain not less than
25 percent of meat computed on the weight of the fresh meat. Head meat, cheek
meat, or heart meat exclusive of the heart cap may be used to the extent of 25
percent of the meat ingredient, and its presence shall be reflected in the
statement of ingredients required by Part 317 of this

Article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
319.301

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
